attributes.action: Bring the number of attack submarines to 20 and keep it there
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Besides increasing Russian (thanks to Putin), Chinese and and Venezuelan submarine fleets, as well as a still-existant Argentine submarine fleet, we need subs for intel operations, engaging surface and ground targets, and preventing Al Qaeda from attacking trade ships and choking seaways such as the Suez Channel and the Panama Canal, which they plan to do.
